text: @SenSchumer 1/2] Since it may be Possible for each State to receive Bailout Funding, why can't the State set up: 1) Mass Testing for the Coronavirus; 2) Temporary Issue SNAP Benefits to every Adult Citizen; 3) Temporary Issue Medicaid to All Citizens in that State to address every Medical
